name: Tut Tut (DocGeraud)
description:
A tiny game made in 7 hours for the Trijam 162. 

Play with your mouse

  • Select a car to change lane with it (if there is enough space for it)
  • Repair cars by clicking 3 times on it
  • Don't let fast cars turn into angry cars, or you'll lose

Made by

  • Géraud Zucchini (game)
  • Antoine Druaux (music)
  • Heavily inspired by the art of LuizStockler
